name: Pokémon snap (itch)
description: Its time for an adventure! Professer Oak needs pictures of pokemon for research, so you go out and take pictures of pokemon in there natural habitat. Visit lots of areas like the forest,the dark forest, beach, sea,volcano and much more! so, what are you waiting for? go take those pictures! WARNING! The game is still a demo so tell me if you have ideas for the full game! The old demo has placeholder graphics and sounds, and it has some game breaking bugs. It will most likely be nothing like the full game.
